quest.name: The First of Many
journal: Alphinaud hopes that you are ready to rejoin the main host.

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: Because I've got other skills! Need I remind you I'm one of the finest hunters this tribe has ever seen? And speak for yourself! I don't remember you being a master culinarian!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...How long has it been since we saw Father? Maybe Alphinaud and I ought to visit Sharlayan.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: So if your mother's food is so good, why are you such a terrible cook? Honestly, you've got to get her to teach you the basics while we're here.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I trust you are well rested and refreshed, yes? Then let us return to the front.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The greater part of the Alliance forces should have advanced into the Peaks by now, but I expect we will pass many of our comrades on the road east.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: There is a checkpoint along the way, as I recall, but we will need only to identify ourselves to the soldiers in order to pass.

dialogue.name: ALLIEDRECRUIT
dialogue.text: Scions! A pleasure to have you with us again.

dialogue.name: ALLIEDRECRUIT
dialogue.text: You'll be happy to hear we've taken Ala Ghiri, and have already begun fortifying it as our new base of operations in the Peaks. Give a shout to the lads as you pass, eh?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The imperials sure do like their towers, don't they?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: My village─the one we visited with Meffrid─is far to the north. There's no easy way to get to it from here, though...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Through the pass and onward to the southeast, was it?

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Well met, Sci─ Wait, where are the rest of you?

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Everything appears to be in order. Very good, very good...

dialogue.name: CONRAD
dialogue.text: Enjoy your time with M'naago and her kin? Aye, that's what I want to hear. Too many soldiers forget the importance of time away from all this.

dialogue.name: SERPENTOFFICER
dialogue.text: On behalf of the Elder Seedseer, I thank you for your swift and decisive action against the primal menace. We are not unaware of the danger it posed to our fair nation.

dialogue.name: STORMOFFICER
dialogue.text: The imperials underestimated us once, and they paid dearly for it. They may not be so easily deceived next time─but if we cannot fool them, we will simply have to break them!

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: As you can see, this part of the Peaks is much higher than the northern reaches, hence why the imperials built Specula Imperatoris where they did.

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: See those three towers to the east? That's her. Sits right on the edge of a cliff, so attacking from the north is a fool's errand. From the south, on the other hand, she's no different from any other imperial installation.

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: You see now why Velodyna was so important, eh? Right, then. Come along─they're waiting for us in Ala Ghiri.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The settlement is remarkably intact. I see little evidence of fighting...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Ala Ghiri's famous for that giant crystal. Some say Rhalgr Himself put it there.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ala Ghiri was once a hub of trade and commerce, as I recall, hence the need for a large central square.

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: Here we are. The new base of operations for the Alliance and the Resistance!

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Greetings, General. I see you have been quite busy in our absence.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Less than you may imagine. The imperials fled at our coming, and we took the village without a fight.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Your timing is impeccable. We were about to discuss our strategy to seize Specula Imperatoris.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Though we are fresh from the road, we should be glad to attend.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Good. Take a moment to gather yourselves, and join us when you are ready.
